isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ 5 Engine Service Manual - Fuel System - Installation - Fuel System Tubing

calloutgroup.callout1: Fuel filter to right cylinder head tube
Fuel filter to left cylinder head tube
M12 banjo bolt with check valve (2)

note.para: Install all fuel tube fittings and anchor clamps finger tight before tightening any to final torque.

step1.para: Position the "fuel filter to right cylinder head tube" on the engine.

Install a new copper washer on an M12 banjo bolt and install bolt through the "fuel filter to right cylinder head tube". Install second copper washer on banjo bolt and install bolt into front of right cylinder head and finger tighten.
Position "fuel filter to left cylinder head tube", "fuel supply to filter tube", and "fuel return to HFCM tube" on the engine.

Install a new copper washer on M12 banjo bolt and install bolt through the "fuel filter to left cylinder head tube". Install second copper washer on banjo bolt and install bolt into front of left cylinder head and finger tighten.

figure.caption: Secondary fuel filter tubes and housing

calloutgroup.callout1: Fuel filter to left cylinder head tube
Fuel filter to right cylinder head tube

step1.para: Connect left and right cylinder head fuel tubes to the fuel filter assembly and finger tighten.
Connect the "fuel return to HFCM tube" to the fuel filter assembly and finger tighten.

Install a new copper washer on the "fuel supply to filter tube" hollow screw and install screw through tube. Install second copper washer on hollow screw and install screw into the fuel filter assembly and finger tighten.
Install M6 x 16 bolt to secure fuel return and supply tubes to the oil pan and finger tighten.
Install M10 x 16 bolt to secure fuel return and supply tubes to the left cylinder head and finger tighten.
Install M6 x 16 bolt to secure "fuel filter to right cylinder head tube" to the intake manifold" and finger tighten.
Using a backup wrench, tighten right and left cylinder head fuel tubes and fuel return to tank tube to special torque .
Tighten fuel supply to filter tube hollow screw to special torque.
Tighten right and left fuel supply tube banjo bolts to special torque.
Tighten M10 x 16 and two M6 x 16 bolts to standard torque .
